長嶋茂雄氏「被害を受けられた方々の窮状に心が痛む」佐倉市の野球教室延期でコメント

01 Nov 2019

　巨人・長嶋茂雄終身名誉監督は１日、出身地の千葉県佐倉市で９日に行われる予定だった「第６回　長嶋茂雄少年野球教室」の開催が台風１５号と同１９号などの影響で延期が決まったことを受け、コメントを発表した。
　佐倉市の発表では同市が甚大な被害を受けたことで復旧・復興を要する現状を重く見て、協議の結果、開催延期を決定。新たな開催時期は未定としている。
　長嶋終身名誉監督のコメントは以下の通り。
　「佐倉市の皆様へ
　この度、佐倉市を始め千葉県内、国内各地で度重なる大型台風、かつて経験したことのない集中豪雨、強風などで、多くの方々が大変な被害を受けられましたことに心からお見舞い申し上げます。
　特に生まれ育った佐倉市の痛ましい状況を聞くにつれ、被害を受けられた方々の窮状には心が痛みます。大きな被害があったことを知り、予定していた少年野球教室は延期させて頂くことにしました。
　今は、大変な被害に苦しまれている皆様が一日も早く、平常の生活を取り戻されることを願っております」
text:
Mr. Shigeo Nagashima “I feel sore by the plight of the victims” commented by postponing the baseball class in Sakura City

01 Nov 2019

Giant Shigeo Nagashima's lifetime honorary director is scheduled to be held on the 9th in Sakura City, Chiba Prefecture on the 1st, and the 6th Shigeo Nagashima Boys' Baseball Class will be affected by typhoons 15 and 19 In response to the decision to postpone it, he announced his comment.
In the announcement of Sakura City, the city decided to postpone the event as a result of discussions, taking a serious look at the current situation requiring restoration and reconstruction due to the severe damage to the city. The new date is undecided.
Nagashima's lifetime honorary director's comments are as follows.
"To everyone in Sakura City
This time, I would like to express my heartfelt condolences to many people who have suffered severe damage from large typhoons that have repeatedly occurred in Sakura and other Chiba prefectures, as well as torrential rains and strong winds that have never been experienced before.
Especially when we hear the painful situation in Sakura City where we were born and raised, the plight of the victims is painful. Knowing that there was a lot of damage, I decided to postpone the boy baseball class that I had planned.
”I hope that everyone suffering from serious damage will be able to regain their normal lives as soon as possible.”
